creator: 0xe9666a038a63ed78fa1210038a7ebd80ffb342f9
name: War is Coming
description:
NFT war is possible because most collections release copyright privileges to the owner of specific NFTs, this allows players to battle with owned NFTs from different collections in a web3 game http://nftthegathering.com

This is a reward/voting platform DAO that will fund the NFT war between collections. We value community, so literally ANYONE can propose rules, balancing, game mechanics, cards,etc. The first DAO vote will be to keep NTG closed or open-source NTG. Approved proposals will be rewarded via NFTs/Polygon. In talks to partner with an established indie developer/publisher, depending on open-source vote. 1st 250 token get airdropped PFP NFT
Rewards:
.1eth+ 100k tokens 1 random NFT
.2eth+ 200k tokens 3 random NFTs
.3eth+ 300k tokens 5 random NFTs
.5eth+ 500k tokens 10 NFTs starter set amount of armor/weapons/materia/stats + random
1eth+ 1 mil tokens 25 NFTs starter plus
*limit 1 per eth address & 7,000 max rewards, to be released late2022/early 2023 & web3 game beta mid 2023
